column1: Enable Customer Vault And Partial Invoices

column1:
Not possible to invoice this order online partially. If you continue, you won’t be able to create another online invoice for this order later. To enable partial invoices for the future orders, set the option %1 to Yes.
Note, if you proceed, you still will be able to invoice the remainder of this order offline.
column2:
Not possible to invoice this order online partially. If you continue, you won’t be able to create another online invoice for this order later. To enable partial invoices for the future orders, set the option %1 to Yes.
Note, if you proceed, you still will be able to invoice the remainder of this order offline.

column1:
Due to limitation of NMI API, you must enable this option if you need to:
- Do partial invoicing on the orders;
- Allow customers to use Shipping With Multiple Addresses.
